turkish_example_sentence: Ben tatlı çikolatalı pastayı alsam, arkadaşlarım çok mutlu olur.
english_example_sentence: If I were to take the sweet chocolate cake, my friends would be very happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я взял сладкий шоколадный торт, мои друзья были бы очень счастливы.
